message: This one is love, Guess how much I miss you?, I miss you as much as the sky misses the stars, I miss you every second I think you are there, I miss you a dozen times, I miss you as my heart skips a beat,I miss the way you talk, I miss those charming smile of yours , I miss the glowing dim eyes that beams, I miss how I spend time with you, I miss the mocking times , I miss those joyous memories, I miss you more than you think a day, I miss you even when you are right by my side
